otherNames: The Sword God Emerges from the Mountains, The Sword God Comes Out, 刀神出山
synopsis: In the era of spiritual energy revival, the once top-tier faction Ba Dao Valley has fallen to having only two members left. In search of the nine lost divine blades, the protagonist Lu Yang comes out of seclusion early. However, with the revival of spiritual energy across the continent, Lu Yang finds himself entangled in one conspiracy after another…
